resources.string: Change the currency of Smart List
Give me suggestions when I type an product into the list
When the price field is empty, type in the price automatically
Change the colors of Smart List or turn on/off night mode
Export my list as an Microsoft Excel Document which I can find in Internal Storage in the folder Smart List
Set the limit of Smart Fill
Choose the export location to internal or external storage for the Microsoft Excel Document
Switch between day mode and night mode
